original_title: 20 Years of Christmas With The Tabernacle Choir
overview: Former Tabernacle Choir guest artist and Tony Award-winner, Brian Stokes Mitchell, is back to remember and relive twenty years of inspiring Christmas concerts. From opera, gospel, and pop singers to Broadway and cabaret stars; from Shakespearean actors and movie and television stars, the Choirâ€™s guest artists provide, not just formidable talent, but a little something for everyone.
title: 20 Years of Christmas With The Tabernacle Choir
